nodes.text: The Nimbanels were a sentient reptilian species that were native to Nimban. They could be found demonstrating their talents throughout the galaxy, particularly in business and government. They were also famed for problem-solving skills. Jay Igno was a Nimbanel air taxi driver on Coruscant. Five years before the Battle of Yavin, a Nimbanel bounty hunter and his Ranat colleague attempted to apprehend the Trandoshan bounty hunter Bossk but were instead knocked unconscious.
